title: Unexpected Claim
description: Ivy is looking to break out of her innocent bubble, so she decides to go to an adult club with her bestie is the way to do it. She’s nervous and excited, but nothing could compare to the reality she's confronted with.  Shep’s been totally okay with living his quiet life alone. But his best friend thinks it’s time he changed that. Being dragged into a club wasn’t his idea of fun, but one glance at the snowy angel and he’s done for.  Warning: This book is about grownups doing grown things, so brace yourself! Two virgins walk-in... Can you guess how many walkout? One-click to find out!
author: Alexa Riley
